entities.name: crouch
entities.description: Crouch is mentioned as a judge for the Triwizard tournament. He is referred to by name and also as 'Mr. Crouch'.

entities.name: igor
entities.description: Igor is mentioned as someone Dumbledore tries to address, but Karkaroff interrupts him.

entities.name: karkaroff
entities.description: Karkaroff is a participant in the Triwizard tournament and accuses Dumbledore of treachery.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is accused by Karkaroff of plotting against him. He is also mentioned as trying to address Igor.

relationships.description: Karkaroff accuses Dumbledore of treachery and plotting against him.
Dumbledore tries to address Igor, but Karkaroff interrupts him.
